s1 =

   -0.0544   -0.9903    0.1276
    0.9784   -0.0785   -0.1914
    0.1996    0.1145    0.9732

>> s2 = [-0.535546 -0.819644 0.203405;
0.819430 -0.562603 -0.109596;
0.204266 0.107982 0.972942]

s2 =

   -0.5355   -0.8196    0.2034
    0.8194   -0.5626   -0.1096
    0.2043    0.1080    0.9729

>> s = s1 * inv(s2)

s =

    0.8668    0.4986    0.0061
   -0.4986    0.8668    0.0051
   -0.0028   -0.0075    1.0000

>> c = [0.90745521, 0.050781876, -0.41706863;
 -0.048650563, 0.9986918, 0.015746079;
 0.41732264, 0.0060017607, 0.90873849]

c =

    0.9075    0.0508   -0.4171
   -0.0487    0.9987    0.0157
    0.4173    0.0060    0.9087

>> r = vrrotmat2vec(s)

r =

   -0.0127    0.0089   -0.9999    0.5220

>> r = vrrotmat2vec(c)

r =

   -0.0116   -0.9929   -0.1183    0.4336
